info.title: Vimeo API
info.description: The only way to perform authenticated read/write requests on videos, users, groups, channels, albums, or upload.

/.description: View all endpoints as URI templates

/categories.description: Get a list of the top level categories.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to show.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items to show on each page. Max 50.

/channels.description: Get a list of all Channels.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction that the results are sorted.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter to apply to the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to show.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items to show on each page. Max 50.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Technique used to sort the results.

400 Invalid Request.description: If relevant sort is provided without a search query

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: The custom string to use in this On Demand pages Vimeo URL.

parameters.name: preorder.active
parameters.description: If set to true, you will enable preorders on the On Demand page

parameters.name: preorder.publish_time
parameters.description: Required if preorder.active is true. The time that the On Demand page will be published

parameters.name: publish.active
parameters.description: If set to true, you will publish the On Demand page

parameters.name: publish_when_ready
parameters.description: This On Demand page will be automatically published when all videos are finished transcoding

400 Invalid Request.description: If relevant sort is provided without a search query

404 Not Found.description: If the On Demand page cannot be found

/videos/{video_id}/pictures.description: Get a list of this video's past and present pictures.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction that the results are sorted.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter to apply to the results.  The CC filters will show only those videos with the applicable creative commons licenses. See our Creative Commons page for more.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to show.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items to show on each page. Max 50.
